__e: I don't know what he's planning, but I'm glad she's not my daughter.
Now, I know not yet what his will for me is, but I have faith. I have faith that the path will be illuminated before me as I need it to be.
You see, I don't know what he's up to, but I'm sure it's no good.
Then, in the meantime, find out what he's planning.
She'll say she has plans and she'll actually think we care.
We don't know what he's planning or who he is, and maybe I can do something about that.
Whatever it is, she messed with our town, our friends, and the people that we care about.
I don't think he's planning on losing her now.
If she's looking to sell them, she'll take them to LAND.
